string.name: The other party is logging in through Google/Apple, etc.

resources.string: 对方是通过Google/Apple等方式登录

string.name: The account is the login account of the shared person.

resources.string: 账号为被共享人的登录账号。

string.name: Allow %@ to access your album in \Settings -> Privacy -> Photos""

resources.string: 请在iPhone的\"设置-隐私-照片\"选项中，允许%@访问你的手机相册

string.name: Please allow %@ to access your camera in \Settings -> Privacy -> Camera""

resources.string: 请在iPhone的\"设置-隐私-相机\"中允许%@访问相机
